_source.text: A&E announced on Friday (January 9) morning that "Bates Motel" will return for its third season on Monday, March 9 at 9 p.m. "Bates Motel" will be followed by the first season of A&E's remake of "The Returned," which A&E hopes will do better than last spring's short-lived "Bates" lead-out "Those That Kill."

text: Monday, **March** **9** at 9 p.m. "Bates Motel" will be followed by the first season of A&E's remake of "The
Returned," which A&E hopes will do **better** **than** last spring's short-lived "Bates" lead-out "Those That Kill."
